title: Kurhani (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
text:
Kurhani (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is an <a href="Vidhan%20Sabha">assembly</a> constituency in <a href="Muzaffarpur%20district">Muzaffarpur district</a> in the <a href="India">India</a>n <a href="States%20and%20territories%20of%20India">state</a> of <a href="Bihar">Bihar</a>.
Overview.
As per Delimitation of Parliamentary and Assembly constituencies Order, 2008, No. 93 Kurhani (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is composed of the following: Kurhani <a href="Community%20Development%20Block%20in%20India">community development block</a>.
Kurhani (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is part of No. 15 <a href="Muzaffarpur%20%28Lok%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Muzaffarpur (Lok Sabha constituency)</a>.
Election results.
1977-2015.
In the <a href="2015%20Bihar%20legislative%20assembly%20election">2015 state assembly election</a>, Kedar Prasad Gupta of BJP defeated Manoj Kumar Singh of JDU. In the <a href="2010%20Bihar%20legislative%20assembly%20election">2010</a>, <a href="Bihar%20Assembly%20Election%2C%20Oct%202005">October 2005</a> and <a href="Bihar%20Assembly%20Election%2C%20Feb%202005">February 2005</a> state assembly elections, Manoj Singh Kushwaha of <a href="Janata%20Dal%20United">JDU</a> won the Kurhani assembly seat defeating his nearest rivals Bijendra Chaudhary of <a href="Lok%20Janshakti%20Party">LJP</a>, <a href="Ajay%20Nishad">Ajay Nishad</a> of <a href="Rashtriya%20Janata%20Dal">RJD</a> and Basawan Bhagat Kushwaha of RJD respectively. Contests in most years were multi cornered but only winners and runners are being mentioned. Basawan Bhagat Kushwaha of RJD defeated Brajesh Kumar of BPSP in 2000. Basawan Bhagat Kushwaha of <a href="Janata%20Dal">JD</a> defeated Ashok Sharma, Independent, in 1995. Sadhu Sharan Shahi, Independent, defeated Sheonandan Rai of <a href="Indian%20National%20Congress">Congress</a> in 1990. Sheonandan Rai of Congress defeated Sadhu Sharan Shahi of <a href="Janata%20Party">JP</a> in 1985. Ram Praikshan Sah of Janata Party (Secular – Charan Singh) defeated Sadhu Sharan Shahi of Janata Party (JP) in 1980. Sadhu Sharan Shahi of JP defeated Hind Keshri Yadav of Congress in 1977.
